quest.text:
In this code, x is set to the number 10. After this a number of if and else if statements will be checked.
Add to this code, by printing out the value of x in word form (ie. 10 is "One Zero".) at the end of the program. (where it says "#print here!")

Remember print in word form. The number 123 would be "One Two Three"
Also, talk to the other characters to learn more about if, else if, and else statements!
Congratulations! You helped Richard with his problem!
